text: Belton is a city in the U.S. state of Texas, within the Killeen-Temple metropolitan area. The city is on the Interstate 35 corridor between Austin and Waco. It is the seat of Bell County. The population was 23,054 at the 2020 census. As of 2020 the metro region had a population of 475,367. ==References== Category:Cities in Texas Category:County seats in Texas
title: Belton, Texas
